title: 065: Alakazam
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Alakazam is so powerful he creates a 2nd spoon to feed its’ need to know – IT NEEDS TO KNOW!

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword),  [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Dan

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Alakazam)
